Name: Stone Cold Fruit
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tart and dry with zesty orange and lemon. Mouth puckeringly refreshing.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Lana Gailani (Seamstress and Holiday Cocktail Lounge), New York City, USA. Cocktail courtesy of gazregan.com.
Nutrition: One serving of Stone Cold Fruit contains 298 calories
